body.name: Brickell Men's Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Natural and Organic Fast-Absorbing Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, and Jojoba, 4 Ounce, Unscented

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Brickell Men's Products Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 53 mins
features: What It Does: This light, fast-absorbing oil free facial moisturizer for men is packed with potent natural ingredients. Hydrates, nourishes, renews, and protects your face without clogging pores.
Who It’s For: Men of any age with any skin type. Men with normal, oily, sensitive, dry, or combo types skin will benefit from this natural men’s face moisturizer.

How It Works: Powerful, natural hydrating ingredients quickly soak into the skin to firm and nourish. Green tea and jojoba oil protect the skin from free radicals and damage in this face moisturizer for men.
Key Ingredients: Natural & Certified Organic ingredients, including aloe, jojoba oil, vitamin E, hyaluronic acid and green tea. 100% natural, 83% organic.

Who We Are: Brickell creates skincare and grooming products for men using natural & certified organic ingredients. Our products are sold in over 20 countries and have appeared in GQ, Men's Health, Men's Journal, and other popular men’s magazines.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Step 1: Clarifying Gel Face Wash Step 2: Balancing Toner Step 3: Reviving Day Serum Step 4: Daily Essential Face Moisturizer Step 5: Restoring Eye Cream How to Use Wet your face with warm water, pour a quarter size dose into the palm of your hand, and work into a rich lather. Spray onto a cotton ball or directly onto freshly cleansed, dry skin. Pat over areas of the skin where oil, shine, and acne build up the most. Apply a pea size amount of serum onto your entire face. Make sure to cover the entire face down into the neck. Massage a dime size amount of the men's moisturizer onto clean, dry skin, making sure to cover the entire face. Apply a pea size amount below and around the eye, including the upper cheekbone. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Superb facial moisturizer for winter dry skin!
reviews.reviewText: As a fan of Brickell Men’s Products (especially the eye cream and serum) I thought I would give their Daily Essential Face Moisturizer a try as I’ve been dealing with dry skin these last couple of months with the wind and cold temperatures. I’ve been using it about a week now and I am very happy with this product. And you don’t need to wait a week for results…it provided excellent results with the very first use! It also has a really nice scent (not a strong, overwhelming scent either). At first I didn’t think I would like it because it stayed white on my skin even as I rubbed it in, but then I realized you just have to wait 2 minutes or so and the product absorbs nicely into the skin leaving a soft and radiant look! Very happy with this face moisturizer and I plan to purchase it again. Another great product from Brickell!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hydrate and Nourish Your Skin with Brickell Moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: As someone who has struggled to find the perfect moisturizer for my skin, I can confidently say that Brickell Moisturizer is a game-changer. This luxurious product has become an essential part of my daily skincare routine, and I am thrilled to share my experience with it.One of the standout features of this moisturizer is its lightweight and non-greasy feel. Upon application, it absorbs quickly. I have noticed a significant improvement in the overall smoothness and suppleness of my skin since incorporating Brickell into my skincare regimen.Beyond its moisturizing properties, Brickell has also been effective in combating dryness, reducing the appearance of fine lines, and enhancing the natural glow of my skin. This multi-functional product has simplified my routine and delivered noticeable results, which is something I greatly appreciate.Furthermore, I appreciate that Brickell Moisturizer is free of harsh chemicals, parabens, and sulfates, making it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Knowing that I am treating my skin to a product that is both effective and gentle gives me peace of mind.In conclusion, Brickell Moisturizer has exceeded my expectations in every way. Its nourishing formula, lightweight texture, and visible results have made it a must-have in my skincare collection. If you're in search of a high-quality moisturizer that delivers on its promises, I highly recommend giving Brickell a try. Your skin will thank you!Overall Rating: 5/5

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Refreshing Boost for your Skin
reviews.reviewText: One of the standout features for me was the fantastic scent. It's subtle yet invigorating, providing a fresh and clean feel after application. The fragrance isn't overpowering, making it suitable for daily use without being too conspicuous. - Scent 5/5What sets this moisturizer apart is its lightweight texture. It's not as oily as some other products I've tried, which is a big plus. The formula absorbs quickly into the skin, leaving no greasy residue. - Texture 4.5/5The moisturizer strikes a perfect balance between hydration and a non-greasy feel. It kept my skin moisturized throughout the day without causing any breakouts. The ingredients seem to be well-formulated for different skin types, and I appreciated the overall improvement in my skin's texture. - Hydration 4.5/5In conclusion, the Brickell Men's Daily Moisturizer exceeded my expectations. It combines a great scent with a non-oily texture, making it a top choice for those looking to elevate their skincare routine. - Overall Experience 5/5

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Brickell men's products for about 3 to 4 years. They continue to be the highest quality and vital to my skin care needs. And they are reasonably priced and less than other "high-end" brands.This Daily Face Moisturizer is the best I have ever used. I tend to have dry skin and have used innumerable face lotion brands and types. But once I found this lotion my search was over. This lotion not only smells great, it spreads evenly and smoothly with just a little bit of lotion. It goes a long way and keeps my face from drying out for most of the day which is a miracle.Give it a try, you won't regret it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Face Moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: Light, absorbs quickly and not greasy. Feels great after a shave.Excellent product and great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more dry skin and excellent smell
reviews.reviewText: This winter has hit my face hard. The dry skin was absolutely terrible this year. This has fixed that. The smell is excellent, natural, and it doesn’t have that annoying greasy feel to it that a lot of lotions have. It absorbs very quickly and feels great. Honestly, there hasn’t been a Brickell product that I haven’t liked yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Product color and scent has changed
reviews.reviewText: I loved this product, but on my latest order (mind you I returned and re-ordered to be sure) I noticed the scent, color of the product, and the bottle labeling itself has changed when when compared to the previous bottle I threw away and the picture being advertised.Now I don’t know if this was meant as an improvement so as I use their new product I’ll see if it works the same, better, or worse for my skin type.Rating is mainly based on the change because they didn’t advertise the change and the scent now isn’t as charming like before in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simply the best
reviews.reviewText: This face moisturizer is amazing and absolutely essential on cold days! Non-greasy, refreshing, absorbs quickly, won’t clog pores, and a dime-sized amount covers my face and lasts all day. Brickell has really cracked the code with this product!

As someone who consistently uses this facial moisturizer, I've found that it consistently suits my skin regardless of my location. I purchased a smaller bottle for my travels, but I had to resort to a different moisturizer during one trip. I must confess, nothing compares to the effectiveness of this particular facial moisturizer.

So, I've been using this moisturizer for men for a few weeks now, and I gotta say, I'm pretty happy with it. It's got a nice texture that doesn't feel too heavy or greasy on my skin, and I appreciate that it doesn't have a strong scent.I really like how quickly it absorbs into my skin too. It doesn't leave any weird residue or stickiness, which makes it easy to use both in the morning and before bed. And I've definitely noticed an improvement in my skin's texture and appearance since I started using it.Now, I will say that if you've got really dry or rough skin, this might not be the best option for you. But for me, it's been working really well. It's not the most heavy-duty moisturizer out there, but it gets the job done.Overall, I think this is a solid choice if you're in the market for a new moisturizer. It's simple, effective, and doesn't have any annoying fragrances. So if you're a guy like me who just wants a moisturizer that works, give this one a shot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried multiple moisturisers over the past few years and always return to this product. I’m in my early 40’s and whilst searching for new products I realised I had combination skin (oily/dry). I have purchased other brands to try alongside the Brickell Moisturiser but I always pass these on to family and friends. The moisturiser is more like a lotion which is great because it’s light and absorbs into my skin without leaving any residue or stickiness and you only have to apply a small amount which is a bonus. I only apply the moisturiser once a day after I’ve showered and my skin feels hydrated, oil-free and without any shine that I seem to get later in the afternoon with other products I’ve tried. I always purchase the scented moisturiser because I like the refreshing minty eucalyptus smell, however, I’m not sure if this would be to everyone's liking. The moisturiser isn’t the cheapest hence my reason for trying other products but sometimes you get what you pay for. I think the packaging could look a little more high-end due to the price point, but this is only a very small criticism.This product now forms part of my daily routine alongside other products from the Brickell’s range, I would definitely recommend this product if you’re having difficulties finding the correct daily moisturiser like I did.

Seit dem ich diese Feuchtigkeitscreme für Männer entdeckt habe, ist sie zu einem unverzichtbaren Bestandteil meiner täglichen Pflegeroutine geworden. Vom ersten Tag an, an dem ich sie benutzt habe, war ich absolut begeistert.Ich trage die Creme jeden Morgen nach dem Aufstehen und auch nach dem Rasieren auf. Der Effekt ist einfach fantastisch! Meine Haut fühlt sich viel besser an und ist irgendwie straffer geworden. Ich merke förmlich, wie sie mit Feuchtigkeit versorgt wird und sich regeneriert. Das hat nicht nur mir selbst auffallen können, sondern auch meinen Kollegen. Sie haben mir sogar gesagt, dass ich frischer aussehe!Die Konsistenz der Creme ist angenehm und sie zieht schnell in die Haut ein, ohne einen fettigen Rückstand zu hinterlassen. Der dezente Duft ist ebenfalls ein Pluspunkt für mich, da er nicht aufdringlich ist und gut zur Männlichkeit passt.Ich bin wirklich froh, diese Feuchtigkeitscreme entdeckt zu haben. Sie hat meine Erwartungen übertroffen und ich kann sie uneingeschränkt empfehlen. Wenn Sie nach einer hochwertigen Pflege für Männer suchen, die Ihrer Haut ein gesünderes und frischeres Aussehen verleiht, dann sollten Sie definitiv diese Feuchtigkeitscreme ausprobieren!

Uso i prodotti Brickell da qualche tempo e devo dire che fanno molto bene il loro lavoro! Oltre alla crema idratante, uso il detergente per il viso e occasionalmente lo scrub.La crema idratante è realizzata con ingredienti naturali come l'aloe vera, l'olio di jojoba, il tè verde e l'acido ialuronico.Ha una consistenza leggera, che la rende facile da applicare e si assorbe rapidamente senza lasciare residui grassi.Nel mio caso ha contribuito a ridurre alcune linee sottili, rughe e altri segni del tempo, grazie alla sua potente miscela di antiossidanti e acidi grassi essenziali. Inoltre, aiuta a uniformare il tono della pelle e a migliorarne l'aspetto generale.Il profumo è delicato e maschile, mia moglie lo adora!Nel complesso, sono molto soddisfatto dei prodotti Brickell e li acquisterò sicuramente di nuovo!
